text: The Bad News Bears Go to Japan is a 1978 American sports comedy movie directed by John Berry and starring Tony Curtis and Jackie Earle Haley. It was a sequel to the 1977 movie The Bad News Bears in Breaking Training. ==Other websites== * Category:1978 comedy-drama movies Category:1970s sports movies Category:Bad News Bears movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by John Berry Category:Movies set in Tokyo Category:American sports comedy movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:American sequel movies Category:Baseball movies Category:American comedy-drama movies
title: The Bad News Bears Go to Japan
